hero.name:
Ahmed Hossam
Al Naggar
hero.title: Software Development Engineer
hero.tagline: Angular & React — Scalable, performant, clean code

paragraphs: I am a Frontend Developer with **4+ years** of experience building scalable, high-performance web, applications across diverse industries. I specialize in **Angular** and have solid experience with **React**, focusing on creating clean, maintainable, and reusable code. I excel at translating UI/UX designs into responsive, user-friendly interfaces and optimizing performance for complex applications. With working knowledge of backend technologies such as ASP.NET and Node.js, I ensure smooth integration between frontend and backend systems. I am highly collaborative, detail-oriented, and experienced in solving complex problems while delivering projects efficiently and on time.

skills.title: Backend & Tools
skills.description: Node.js, ASP.NET • Git, GitHub, GitLab • i18n, SEO, Performance

experience.description:
Contributed to the development of an ERP platform with Angular, translating 
Figma mockups into scalable, responsive interfaces. Worked cross-functionally 
with UI/UX and backend teams to ensure seamless API integration and efficient 
business workflows.

Worked on two major projects — an HR platform and NAVI (real estate) — 
delivering scalable, maintainable frontend solutions. Refactored and 
restructured the entire project for better architecture, improved performance, 
and easier scalability. Built new features, optimized existing functionalities, and 
resolved reported issues while maintaining clean, reusable, and well
documented code.

Built and maintained a CRM application in Angular, converting complex designs 
into interactive, responsive components. Partnered with backend developers for 
efficient integration and maintained performance-optimized, scalable code.

Developed and maintained user-focused web applications using JavaScript 
(ES6+), Angular, React, and jQuery. Delivered custom solutions for high-traffic 
and government projects such as haj.gov.sa, and built and customized 
WordPress websites and Shopify e-commerce stores with a focus on 
performance, responsiveness, and cross-browser compatibility.

projects.title: HRM System
projects.description: Enterprise HR platform with dashboards and workflows.

projects.description: Full-featured ERP with modules and reporting.
